item.description: Measuring Volume Of Irregular Objects Instruments Measuring cylinder Water Procedure Fill the water in the measuring cylinder Take initial volume (reading) Put object into measuring cylinder Group A B C Initial (V₁) 31cm³ 29cm³ 30cm³ Final (V₂) 36cm³ 35cm³ 35cm³ Group A $$V = V_2 - V_1 $$ $$V = 36 - 31$$ $$V = 6cm^3$$
